uweigand commented on issue #2977:

Huh, it turns out this test case also exposes _multiple_ pre-existing bugs in trap handling, both in the s390x back-end and in common code. All in all, I need the following four patches to make the test case pass:
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3012
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3013
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3014
https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3015
